{{Description|As summer comes into its own, [[Fischl]] receives an important missive and departs with everyone in town to begin another marvelous sojourn...}}
'''Summertime Odyssey''' is a [[Flagship Event]] in [[Version 2.8]]. It takes place on a limited time map, the [[Golden Apple Archipelago/2.8|Golden Apple Archipelago]].

===Requirements===
* Reach [[Adventure Rank]] 32 or above
* Complete the [[Archon Quest]] "[[Chapter II]]: Prologue - [[Autumn Winds, Scarlet Leaves]]".
* Complete [[Mona]]'s [[Story Quest]] "[[Astrolabos Chapter]]: Act I - [[Beyond This World's Stars]]".
** During this time, the Adventure Rank required to accept Mona's Story Quest will be adjusted to Adventure Rank 32. Complete Mona's Story Quest to enhance your experience.
** If Mona's Story Quest has not been completed, players can enter the event through "Quick Start" in the event page.

===Summary===
* During the event, complete the specified tasks in "Surfpiercer" and "Phantom Realms" to obtain rewards such as [[Primogem]]s, [[Hero's Wit]], and [[Mystic Enhancement Ore]]. Complete the "Phantom Realms" challenges to obtain [[Iridescent Flotsam]]. Accumulate a specified number of Iridescent Flotsam to invite "Prinzessin der Verurteilung!" [[Fischl]] ({{Electro}})! You can also use Iridescent Flotsam to exchange for rewards such as [[Crown of Insight]], [[Character Level-Up Materials]], and [[Talent Level-Up Materials]] from the Event Shop.

===Tutorial===
;Cloudleisure Steps
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Cloudleisure Steps 1.png
|text1 = Use the lift you get from exiting the [[Waverider]] to get up to the [[Cloudleisure Step]]s.
|image2 = Tutorial Cloudleisure Steps 2.png
|text2 = There are two types of Cloudleisure Steps: one can be used as a normal floating platform, while the other type can increase characters' {{Color|Pyro|jumping power}}.
|image3 = Tutorial Cloudleisure Steps 3.png
|text3 = When you set foot on a Cloudleisure Step, it {{Color|Pyro|will light up}}.<br />Such steps usually appear in groups. The next group of steps will only appear once the current group has been {{Color|Pyro|completely lit up}}.
}}
;Prismatic Rampart
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Prismatic Rampart 1.png
|text1  = The Prismatic Rampart can be used to fire arrows of different {{Color|Pyro|colorations}}.
|image2 = Tutorial Prismatic Rampart 2.png
|text2  = You can adjust the Prismatic Rampart's {{Color|Pyro|angles of elevation, depression}}, and {{Color|Pyro|rotation}} to allow it to hit targets in different positions.
|image3 = Tutorial Prismatic Rampart 3.png
|text3  = {{Color|Pyro|Prismatic Seals of certain colors can be dispelled}} by {{Color|Pyro|arrows of the same color}} fired by Prismatic Ramparts.<br />There are three different colors for Seals and arrows.
|image4 = Tutorial Prismatic Rampart 4.png
|text4  = After you have picked up a {{Color|Pyro|[[Prismatic Gem]]}}, you can {{Color|Pyro|unlock a new arrow color}} at the Prismatic Rampart.
}}
;Of Bonsai and Mountains
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Of Bonsai and Mountains 1.png
|text1 = Touch the bonsai to activate the placement menu.
|image2 = Tutorial Of Bonsai and Mountains 2.png
|text2 = You can {{Color|Pyro|adjust the mountain stones on the left and right of the bonsai}} to cause the island mountains to undergo matching changes..
}}
;Melodic Omamori
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Melodic Omamori 1.png
|text1  = When you find Melodic Omamori, you can pick them up and carry them with you.
|image2 = Tutorial Melodic Omamori 2.png
|text2  = Place Melodic Omamori in a special shrine to cause certain changes in the surrounding area.
}}
;Melodic Harps and Melodic Blooms
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Melodic Harps and Melodic Blooms 1.png
|text1  = When the [[Melodic Harp]] is {{Color|Pyro|glowing}}, it can be activated.<br />An activated Melodic Harp will release sound waves that will cause any [[Melodic Bloom]]s within an AoE to {{Color|Pyro|fire notes}}.
|image2 = Tutorial Melodic Harps and Melodic Blooms 2.png
|text2  = The notes fired off by a Melodic Bloom can be transferred to the next Melodic Bloom, which can {{Color|Pyro|change the flight direction of the notes}}. Get close to a Melodic Bloom to change the direction it is facing.<br />Use the transfer of notes in this way to solve certain puzzles.
}}
;Melodic Pedals
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Melodic Pedals 1.png
|text1 = Step on adjacent [[Melodic Pedal]]s and light them all up to awaken the Melodic Harp.<br />An awakened Melodic Harp will {{Color|Pyro|give off a unique radiance}}.
|image2 = Tutorial Melodic Pedals 2.png
|text2 = Some Melodic Pedals have {{Color|Pyro|special functions}}. You can tell these apart by the special symbols that they are marked by.
}}
;Changing Mountain Styles
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Changing Mountain Styles 1.png
|text1  = A drum overgrown with vines can be found somewhere in the archipelago. You can seemingly use this special drum to change the height of certain mountains.
|image2 = Tutorial Changing Mountain Styles 2.png
|text2  = You can find certain clues that will help solve puzzles by observing the patterns of change in the mountains.
}}
;Gaze of the Deep<nowiki>:</nowiki> Path Restoration
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Gaze of the Deep Path Restoration 1.png
|text1  = Approach the special device, Gaze of the Deep, and use it to observe your surroundings and find certain {{Color|Pyro|misplaced images}}. They seem to be connected to their surroundings somehow...
|image2 = Tutorial Gaze of the Deep Path Restoration 2.png
|text2  = {{Color|Pyro|Move}} the vision of the Gaze of the Deep to move the incorrectly-placed pictures in four directions and bring them closer to their original spots.
|image3 = Tutorial Gaze of the Deep Path Restoration 3.png
|text3  = {{Color|Pyro|Zoom in and out}} on the vision of the Gaze of the Deep to more accurately place the incorrectly-located pictures back to their original places.<br />{{Color|Pyro|Rotate}} and {{Color|Pyro|zoom}} the image you see through the Gaze of the Deep to return the misplaced pictures back to their proper places and restore the normal path...
}}
;Gaze of the Deep<nowiki>:</nowiki> Structure Completion
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Gaze of the Deep Structure Completion 1.png
|text1  = Adjust the Gaze of the Deep's field of view and use other objects to {{Color|Pyro|block}} missing construction components to affect the environment and restore the complete structure.
|image2 = Tutorial Gaze of the Deep Structure Completion 2.png
|text2  = Even if obstacles lie between the Gaze of the Deep and any missing structures, you can simply {{Color|Pyro|adjust the viewing angle to the appropriate position}} to repair said constructs.
}}
;Gaze of the Deep<nowiki>:</nowiki> Mechanism Activation
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Gaze of the Deep Mechanism Activation 1.png
|text1  = Use the Gaze of the Deep to move the floating Shadowy Cubes.
|image2 = Tutorial Gaze of the Deep Mechanism Activation 2.png
|text2  = Adjust your viewing angle to place the Shadowy Cubes {{Color|Pyro|on the target boards}} to activate the mechanism.
}}
;The Raven Forum<nowiki>:</nowiki> Judgement
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial The Raven Forum 1.png
|text1 = Speak to the Night Raven Statue (Questioner) to start a case determination process.

|image2 = Tutorial The Raven Forum 2.png
|text2 = Once the other Night Raven Statues have finished giving their statements, {{Color|help|your target can be identified}}.
}}
;The Raven Forum<nowiki>:</nowiki> Lies
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial The Raven Forum 3.png
|text1 = Night Raven Statues with {{Color|help|blue}} scarves {{Color|help|will not lie}}. You can use statements from this sort of statue as a reference.

|image2 = Tutorial The Raven Forum 4.png
|text2 = Night Raven Statues with {{Color|help|red}} scarves {{Color|help|lie often}}. Take care when considering the statements made by such statues.
}}

==Surfpiercer==
{{Main|Summertime Odyssey/Surfpiercer}}
Unlock Criteria: Unlocks after completing the quest "[[The Golden Apple Vacation Returns!|Summertime Odyssey: I]]"
* For the first three days of the event, a new Waverider challenge will unlock every day. Complete the specified challenge tasks to obtain rewards such as Primogems, Hero's Wit, and Mystic Enhancement Ore.

* During the event, complete the "Initial Exploration" challenge in "Phantom Realms" to unlock "Direct Strike" and carry out the challenges.
* Complete the specified challenges in "Phantom Realms" to obtain rewards such as Primogems, Hero's Wit, and Mystic Enhancement Ore.
* Complete the specified challenges in "Phantom Realms" to obtain Iridescent Flotsam. Accumulate a specified number of Iridescent Flotsam to invite "Prinzessin der Verurteilung!" Fischl (Electro)! You can also use Iridescent Flotsam to exchange for rewards such as Crown of Insight, Character Level-Up Materials, and Talent Level-Up Materials from the Event Shop.
* When the Event Shop closes, any remaining Iridescent Flotsam in your possession will automatically disappear, and the relevant Event Shop page(s) will also close.
* During the event, you will automatically accept the quest "Summertime Odyssey: VI" after completing the quest "Summertime Odyssey: V." Complete the quests to obtain rewards such as Primogems, Hero's Wit, and Mora. After the event has ended, you will no longer be able to participate in the "Summertime Odyssey" quest.
